name: CWWiFiClient
desc: A wrapper around the entire Wi-Fi subsystem that you use to access interfaces and set up event notifications.

items.name: var delegate: AnyObject?
items.desc: An object that provides Wi-Fi event handling.

items.name: func interface(withName: String?) -> CWInterface?
items.desc: Returns the Wi-Fi interface with the given name.

items.name: class func interfaceNames() -> [String]?
items.desc: Returns the list of the names of available Wi-Fi interfaces.

items.name: func startMonitoringEvent(with: CWEventType)
items.desc: Register for specific Wi-Fi event notifications.

items.name: func stopMonitoringAllEvents()
items.desc: Unregister for all Wi-Fi event notifications.

items.name: func stopMonitoringEvent(with: CWEventType)
items.desc: Unregister for specific Wi-Fi event notifications.
